name: Proxy Poster
author: Lerie Taylor

sections.description:
This plugin will allow administrators to post proxy lists from selected sources. Be kind, share a proxy.

Proxy Sites Listed

  • aliveproxy.com
  • atomintersoft.com
  • proxylist.net
  • proxylists.net
  • freeproxy.ru
  • socks24.blogspot.com
  • digitalcybersoft
  • freshproxy.org
  • my-proxy.com
  • proxyblind.org
  • proxyserverprivacy.com
  • proxz.com
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the “proxy-poster” folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Select “Proxy Poster” under the “Posts” menu

1.1

1.0
